original_text: Samaria shall become desolate; for she hath rebelled against her God: they shall fall by the sword: their infants shall be dashed in pieces, and their women with child shall be ripped up.
korean_text: 사마리아가 그들의 하나님을 배반하였으므로 형벌을 당하여 칼에 엎드러질 것이요 그 어린 아이는 부서뜨려지며 아이 밴 여인은 배가 갈라지리라

sentences.original_text: for she hath rebelled against her God:
sentences.korean_translation: 그 이유는 그녀가 자기 하나님을 반역하였기 때문이니:

sentences.original_text: they shall fall by the sword:
their infants shall be dashed in pieces,
and their women with child shall be ripped up.
sentences.korean_translation: 그들의 아이 밴 여인들은 찢기울 것이다.
